title: Sweet Lucy - Blonde Steele 001 (1994) (Talon-Novus-HD) [NVS-D]
description:
English | CBR | 37 Pages

Sweet Lucy: Blonde Steele #1
Publisher:  Brainstorm Comics
Publication Date:  July 1994

Created, Written, and Illustrated by Scott Harrison
Lettered by Gary Peterson

The 20-page lead feature follows Sweet Lucy and Linnea Steele as they battle mutants in the wasteland.  King Airegem receives a vision of impending war and prepares for battle in a seven-page story that melds elements of science-fiction, fantasy and psychedelia. (The story closes with "to be continued." but this was the series' only issue.)  This issue's 27 pages of art and story are followed by four pages of pin-ups by Scott Harrison.

Thanks goes to Talon for this release.
